thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 05 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Fairfax To Acquire Certain Canadian Assets Of Carillion

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Fairfax To Acquire Certain Canadian Assets Of Carillion
text:
Feb 5 (Reuters) - Fairfax Financial Holdings Ltd:
* FAIRFAX TO ACQUIRE CERTAIN CANADIAN ASSETS OF CARILLION * FAIRFAX FINANCIAL HOLDINGS - FAIRFAX WILL ACQUIRE CERTAIN ASSETS AND ASSUME CERTAIN LIABILITIES RELATED TO CARILLION CANADA HOLDINGS‘S CANADIAN OPERATIONS
* FAIRFAX FINANCIAL - TO ACQUIRE SERVICES BUSINESS CARRIED ON BY CARILLION IN CANADA RELATING TO FACILITIES MANAGEMENT OF AIRPORTS, AMONG OTHERS
* FAIRFAX FINANCIAL HOLDINGS - ‍INTENDS TO APPOINT DAVID JOHNSTON, STEPHEN WALLACE TO BOARD OF ACQUIRED CANADIAN COMPANIES UPON CLOSING OF TRANSACTION​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
